title: hari dinadali
sahitya:
hari dinadali uNDa nararige ghOra naraka tappaduyendu shruti sArutalide


caraNam 1    gOvu konda pApa viprara sAvira jIva hatyava mADida pApavu 
bhAvajanayyana dinadi uNDavaranu kIvinoLage hAki kudisuva yamanu
    caraNam 2    ondondu aguLige kOTi kOTi krimigaLu andina annavu nAyi mAmsavu 
mandarOddhArana dinadi uNDavrannu handiya suDuvante suDisuva yamanu
    caraNam 3    anna pAna tAmbUla darpaNagaLu cenna vastragaLella varjitavu 
tanna satiyara sanga mADida nararige bennali karuLa tegeva kaNDya yamanu
    caraNam 4    jAvada jAgara kratu nALku sAvira jAva nAlkara phalake mitiyillavu 
dEva dEvana dinadi nidre gaivana kAvaliyoLu hAki hurisuva yamanu
    caraNam 5    intu EkAdashi upavAsa jAgara santata kSIrAbdhi shayanana pUje 
santuSTiyindali mADida janarigadyanta phalavIva purandara viTTala
